name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
System Level Developer with 13+ years of expertise in **Go**, proficient in **system-level programming**, **containers**, and **network configuration**. Skilled in deploying and managing projects on **Ubuntu** and **Kubernetes**, with a solid understanding of **DevOps** practices and **version control systems**. I have hands-on experience with **VMware** for virtualization and extensive knowledge of managing **storage devices**. My background includes optimizing application performance and scalability using system thinking principles.

Additionally, I bring a strong skill set in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for complete application development. I have a proven track record in creating high-performance applications tailored for the healthcare and financial industries, with a focus on quality and compliance. My expertise extends to building AI/ML-powered platforms and cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, along with implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines.
